name: Concentrated Flow Point Index
functionStatement: Local inputs from tributaries, ditches, and pipes do not create harmful peaks or pollution and support diverse habitat conditions.
descriptionMarkdown: Count of concentrated inflow locations (ditches, pipes, outfalls) that can deliver runoff, sediment, or pollutants to the reach.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field (with desktop pre-screen)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Walk the reach (or use imagery pre-screen) and count concentrated inflow points; normalize by reach length (e.g., per 1,000 ft or per 100 m).

inputs.label: Concentrated Flow Point Index
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field reconnaissance and/or municipal outfall/ditch GIS with imagery validation.

references: Municipal MS4/NPDES outfall layers where available

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Field reconnaissance and/or municipal outfall/ditch GIS with imagery validation.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Local inputs from tributaries, ditches, and pipes do not create harmful peaks or pollution and support diverse habitat conditions.
sourceMetadata.description: Count of concentrated inflow locations (ditches, pipes, outfalls) that can deliver runoff, sediment, or pollutants to the reach.
sourceMetadata.methodContextRaw:
Context: Channel
Method: Field (with desktop pre-screen)
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Walk the reach (or use imagery pre-screen) and count concentrated inflow points; normalize by reach length (e.g., per 1,000 ft or per 100 m).
referencesRaw: Wisconsin SQT; Municipal MS4/NPDES outfall layers where available; high-resolution aerial imagery
